item.title: Australian Classification rates Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma for PS5 and Xbox Series, Disgaea 7 Complete
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/australian-classification-rates-rune-factory-guardians-of-azuma-for-ps5-and-xbox-series-disgaea-7-complete

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Ports and localization incoming?

Australian Classification has published ratings for Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma, which includes both PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions, and Disgaea 7 Complete.

Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma is due out for Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on June 5. PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions have yet to be announced.

Disgaea 7 Complete, the assumed localization for Disgaea 7: Koremade no Zenbu Iri Hajemamashita., originally launched for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on July 25, 2024 in Japan, featuring all existing downloadable content and bonus items, plus a new bonus story, new characters, and new post-game elements. It has yet to be announced for a western release.

item.title: Tabletop figurines turn-based strategy game Table Tactics announced for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/tabletop-figurines-turn-based-strategy-game-table-tactics-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-xbox-one-switch-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

From Just Crow Things developer Unbound Creations.

Just Crow Things developer Unbound Creations has announced Table Tactics, a turn-based strategy game where all units are tabletop figurines you need to knock over. It will be available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Unbound Creations:

Table Tactics is a unique blend of strategy and physics, played with little miniature figurines. Imagine you are staring at your kitchen table where you laid out a little fantasy diorama and carefully placed miniatures to defend your castle. Alas, enemy units are coming from all directions! But instead of decreasing their health or worrying about armor, you must physically knock them over by shooting various projectiles (like arrows or marbles), using traps, or pushing them off the table. You’ll need to take the shape and weight of each figurine into consideration.

The archers are your basic unit—they shoot an arrow which, when aimed well, can topple almost any figurine. The Catapult flings heavy marbles that roll around—great for big groups of enemies! And the Mage can cast an explosive fireball, knocking everything in its blast radius. There are many more units to collect and alter your playstyle.

As you complete levels and challenges, you will earn gold coins to buy and trade new miniatures. Build a custom roster, experiment with synergies, and create the most powerful tabletop physics army!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: IO Interactive officially announces 007 First Light
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/io-interactive-officially-announces-007-first-light

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Reveal set for later this week.

IO Interactive has officially announced 007 First Light, its new video game starring James Bond. A formal reveal is planned for sometime this week, featuring never-before-seen footage.

“007 First Light is a brand new James Bond video game developed and published by IO Interactive,” reads the teaser website. “Featuring a wholly original Bond origin story, players will step into the shoes of the world’s favorite Secret Agent to earn their 00 status.”

Switch 2 is the only confirmed platform for 007 First Light at the moment, as announced during April’s Switch 2 Direct, although the game is expected to be available on multiple platforms, as per the initial project announcement.

item.title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation for Switch launches this summer in Asia with English language support
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/hyperdimension-neptunia-rebirth2-sisters-generation-for-switch-launches-this-summer-in-asia-with-english-language-support

  • Switch

Published by eastasiasoft.

eastasiasoft will release the Switch version of Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation both physically and digitally in Asia this summer, the publisher announced. It will include English and Traditional Chinese text, as well as English and Japanese voice-overs.

The physical edition will be available for pre-order via Play-Asia starting June 5 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET. Only 2,000 Limited Editions will be produced, which include the game, manual, soundtrack CD, art book, Joy-Con stickers, mini case, acrylic standees, and a numbered certificate in a collector’s box for $59.99. A $39.99 standard edition will also be available. (You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.)

The Switch versions of the Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth trilogy were originally planned to release in the west, but were cancelled after being informed the games “did not comply with Nintendo Guidelines.” The PlayStation 4 versions, however, are due out both physically and digitally in the west later in 2025. eastasiasoft has already announced plans to release Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 for Switch in Asia.

Here is an overview of the game, via eastasiasoft:

About

In the year 20XX, Gamindustri faces a dire crisis! Ever since the advent of ASIC, the Arfoire Syndicate of International Crime, morality has all but vanished. As much as 80 percent of all students are rumored to worship a being known as Arfoire, the authorities have chosen to turn a blind eye to the threat. Thus did Gamindustri fall into complete and utter disarray, with the CPUs nowhere to be found!

It falls to Neptune’s younger sister Nepgear, along with IF and Compa to investigate what happened to Neptune and the rest of their friends. Will the goddesses and goddess candidates be able to reclaim their world from ASIC’s grasp, or will they be forced to wander the Gamindustri Graveyard forever? Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation is a remake of the cult classic Japanese RPG series’ second entry, now with all prior extras included, making it the definitive way to enjoy the game for newcomers and long-time fans alike!

Key Features

  • Experience the second chapter of the Hyperdimension Neptunia series in its definitive form!
  • Command up to four characters on the battlefield, with four more supporting from the sidelines.
  • Deploy mascot Stella to collect dungeon treasure in a risk-vs-reward mini game!
  • Customize the gameplay experience using Plans to increase or decrease difficulty, change item drops and more.
  • Use Idea Chips and Blank Discs to create custom equipment and unlock new skills!

Watch a new set of trailers below.

Gameplay Trailer

Opening Movie
